data: 1 00:00:36,995 --> 00:00:41,375 You again. You lost or hungry? 2 00:00:41,458 --> 00:00:43,126 Hi. 3 00:00:46,588 --> 00:00:50,300 It can't rain all the time-- Can't rain all the time-- 4 00:00:50,384 --> 00:00:56,098 Can't rain all the time-- Can't rain all the time-- Can't rain all the time-- 5 00:01:01,854 --> 00:01:04,439 I don't know how many times I gotta tell you. We're in this together. 6 00:01:04,523 --> 00:01:08,360 We ain't and one part falls and it all falls. 7 00:01:08,443 --> 00:01:10,654 - Do you know how long it took us to put this together? - Yeah, a long time. 8 00:01:10,779 --> 00:01:13,949 That piece of rat shit made Tin Tin into a fuckin' voodoo doll. 9 00:01:14,032 --> 00:01:16,410 Tin Tin was a dick. 10 00:01:16,493 --> 00:01:19,371 Tin Tin. 11 00:01:19,454 --> 00:01:23,584 Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up! 12 00:01:23,667 --> 00:01:26,044 Fire it up! 13 00:01:29,214 --> 00:01:34,261 - No Funboy. - Probably still bangin' away on Darla. 14 00:01:39,641 --> 00:01:43,687 Smokes and road beers. Be quick. 15 00:01:43,812 --> 00:01:46,106 I'm on it. 16 00:02:15,677 --> 00:02:19,056 What the fuck are you supposed to be, man? 17 00:02:20,933 --> 00:02:23,310 I'm your passenger. 18 00:02:30,859 --> 00:02:32,861 Drive. 19 00:02:37,950 --> 00:02:41,954 What's all this happy horseshit? Hey, T-Bird! T-Bird! 20 00:02:47,376 --> 00:02:50,587 - Oh, shit. - What the fuck's the matter with you? 21 00:02:50,671 --> 00:02:54,633 Stupid asshair! You hit my car! 22 00:03:01,682 --> 00:03:06,061 What do you want, man? Money? Drugs? I got it. 23 00:03:07,729 --> 00:03:10,607 We could use you. You did Tin Tin. 24 00:03:10,691 --> 00:03:13,777 - This is business, right? - Faster. 25 00:03:16,738 --> 00:03:18,574 You got that cream stuff? 26 00:03:20,993 --> 00:03:23,370 I hate this. They can't even call it cream legally. 27 00:03:24,371 --> 00:03:26,957 What in the crap-- 28 00:03:31,420 --> 00:03:34,173 Oh, look. You're makin' us popular. 29 00:03:34,256 --> 00:03:37,050 When they flash us like that, they ain't friends. 30 00:03:42,598 --> 00:03:45,601 This is vehicle 38. We got us a big ol'red hot rod. 31 00:03:48,145 --> 00:03:50,314 Hey! 32 00:03:51,648 --> 00:03:56,862 You got somethin' personal, amigo, we can work it out, right? Huh? 33 00:04:01,575 --> 00:04:05,120 Damn! Dead end! 34 00:04:08,248 --> 00:04:10,751 Look out! 35 00:04:14,046 --> 00:04:16,256 Oh, man, get out of the way! 36 00:04:28,393 --> 00:04:31,563 Holy shit! Goddam foreign cars! 37 00:04:36,193 --> 00:04:37,736 Shit! Fuckin'-- 38 00:04:44,868 --> 00:04:48,580 Oh, I hate this. This ain't good. 39 00:04:49,998 --> 00:04:52,459 T-Bird, I got you, man! I'm coming! 40 00:04:53,585 --> 00:04:55,921 Shit! 41 00:05:09,476 --> 00:05:11,895 Remember? Yeah, I remember everything. But I don't know-- 42 00:05:11,979 --> 00:05:16,191 What? What? Huh? What? What are you talkin' about? 43 00:05:16,275 --> 00:05:20,070 No, no, no, no, no. You mean that place downtown? 44 00:05:20,195 --> 00:05:23,198 Yeah, I remember her. We needed to put some fear into that little lady. 45 00:05:23,282 --> 00:05:26,285 She wasn't going along with our tenant relocation programme. 46 00:05:26,410 --> 00:05:32,332 Then her idiot boyfriend shows up and turns a simple sweep-and-clear into a total cluster fuck. 47 00:05:32,416 --> 00:05:35,502 Who gives a shit? It's ancient history. 48 00:05:35,586 --> 00:05:38,797 What? What do you want? What is it? What? 49 00:05:38,881 --> 00:05:42,050 Speak to me. Speak! 50 00:05:43,635 --> 00:05:47,139 Did you send us these complaints? 51 00:05:47,222 --> 00:05:50,517 Come here. ''Abashed the devil stood.'' 52 00:05:50,601 --> 00:05:53,562 Does it get you sweaty? 53 00:05:53,645 --> 00:05:58,025 I know you. I know you. I knew I knew you. 54 00:05:58,108 --> 00:06:00,611 I knew I knew you. 55 00:06:00,694 --> 00:06:03,030 But you ain't you. You can't be you. 56 00:06:03,113 --> 00:06:06,742 We put you through the window. There ain't no comin' back. 57 00:06:06,825 --> 00:06:09,995 This is the really real world. There ain't no comin' back. 58 00:06:10,078 --> 00:06:12,414 We killed you dead. There ain't no comin' back. 59 00:06:15,375 --> 00:06:17,002 T-Bird-- 60 00:06:17,085 --> 00:06:20,047 There ain't no comin' back! There ain't no comin' back! 61 00:06:22,633 --> 00:06:24,927 T-Bird. 62 00:06:27,346 --> 00:06:33,268 ''Abashed the devil stood and felt how awful goodness is.'' 63 00:06:33,352 --> 00:06:36,188 He felt how awful goodness is. 64 00:06:38,357 --> 00:06:40,817 He felt-- 65 00:06:51,537 --> 00:06:54,957 T-Bird. T-Bird! 66 00:07:43,255 --> 00:07:45,465 This is the 7.:00 a.m. edition of Action News. 67 00:07:45,549 --> 00:07:48,093 For over a decade, the night before Halloween... 68 00:07:48,177 --> 00:07:52,264 has had a darker and deadlier nickname in the inner city-- Devil's Night... 69 00:07:52,389 --> 00:07:55,851 the name given to what has become an annual plague of arson. 70 00:07:55,934 --> 00:08:01,231 Last year over 200 individual blazes were reported, and 1 1 people lost their lives. 71 00:08:01,315 --> 00:08:06,445 Tonight, on the eve of what may become the biggest and deadliest Devil's Night ever... 72 00:08:06,528 --> 00:08:10,157 the mayor has firefighters from all surrounding counties as well as-- 73 00:08:10,282 --> 00:08:14,077 Do you like them up or over? I can't remember. 74 00:08:16,121 --> 00:08:18,916 What are you doing? I don't even like eggs. 75 00:08:18,999 --> 00:08:22,044 Wait. You loved eggs. 76 00:08:22,127 --> 00:08:24,296 Yeah, when I was five. 77 00:08:24,379 --> 00:08:28,050 So what do you want now, black coffee and cigarettes? 78 00:08:28,133 --> 00:08:32,137 So what did you take to become Mother of the Year? 79 00:08:32,221 --> 00:08:36,642 Oh, it wasn't drugs. Someone kind of woke me up. 80 00:08:36,725 --> 00:08:42,481 - Who? - Oh, it was nuts. 81 00:08:42,564 --> 00:08:47,778 You're acting weird. Did you win the lottery or something, Darla? 82 00:08:50,322 --> 00:08:55,327 Oh, forget it. I never was too good at this mommy shit. 83 00:08:55,410 --> 00:08:58,789 Over easy. 84 00:08:58,872 --> 00:09:03,085 I like 'em over easy, Mom. 85 00:09:14,346 --> 00:09:16,723 Hey, Albrecht. 86 00:09:19,601 --> 00:09:22,271 This is the third hit in your hood in 24 hours. 87 00:09:22,354 --> 00:09:25,524 We just fished this out of the river. He's fused to his own car. 88 00:09:25,607 --> 00:09:29,778 - We're gonna have to I.D. his teeth. - His name is T-Bird. 89 00:09:29,862 --> 00:09:33,657 Arson was his specialty. Looks like he zigged when he should have zagged. 90 00:09:33,782 --> 00:09:38,370 - Case closed. - Bull-fuckin'-shit. 91 00:09:38,453 --> 00:09:40,831 Come here. 92 00:09:44,042 --> 00:09:46,545 You're holding out on me. 93 00:09:46,628 --> 00:09:51,258 I got a goddam vigilante killer knockin' off scumbags left and right, and you're covering up for somebody. 94 00:09:52,843 --> 00:09:55,846 Who's the cartoon character in the painted face? 95 00:09:55,929 --> 00:09:58,056 Hey, you're the detective. Why don't you tell me? 96 00:09:58,182 --> 00:10:01,310 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell, and you're having a chitchat with some weirdo... 97 00:10:01,393 --> 00:10:04,438 who winds up in T-Bird's car when it zigs instead of zags. 98 00:10:04,521 --> 00:10:07,065 Then you steal one of my case files from homicide... 99 00:10:07,149 --> 00:10:09,484 and you're saying this is just a fuckin' automobile accident? 100 00:10:09,568 --> 00:10:12,154 - Come on! - Yeah. Good speech though. 101 00:10:12,237 --> 00:10:15,991 I didn't want to interrupt you. It sounded good. You know, you gotta write that shit down. 102 00:10:16,074 --> 00:10:21,163 All right, smart-ass. The captain's got a little love note waiting for you. 103 00:10:21,246 --> 00:10:23,749 Welcome to the first day of the rest of your suspension. 104 00:10:23,832 --> 00:10:26,543 Suspension? For what? 105 00:10:26,627 --> 00:10:28,921 Misconduct. 106 00:10:31,048 --> 00:10:33,050 Yeah, give me the lab. 107 00:11:23,725 --> 00:11:26,395 - One for sorrow, two for joy... - Come here. 108 00:11:26,478 --> 00:11:29,314 and three for a girl and four for a boy. 109 00:11:34,319 --> 00:11:36,029 - Dancing-- - Here I am. 110 00:12:09,396 --> 00:12:11,773 Eric? 111 00:12:14,193 --> 00:12:18,071 Man, Sarah, you're going crazy. 112 00:12:18,197 --> 00:12:21,408 Gabriel. 113 00:12:21,491 --> 00:12:24,161 I thought you were dead. 114 00:12:24,286 --> 00:12:26,705 You're not dead, are you? 115 00:12:52,439 --> 00:12:54,900 I knew it was you. 116 00:12:57,236 --> 00:12:59,613 Even with the make-up. 117 00:13:04,826 --> 00:13:07,371 I remembered your song. 118 00:13:07,454 --> 00:13:11,208 You said, ''Can't rain all the time.'' 119 00:13:11,291 --> 00:13:13,669 That is from your song, right? 120 00:13:24,888 --> 00:13:27,599 Come on, Eric, I know you're here. 121 00:13:30,102 --> 00:13:33,021 I miss you and Shelly. 122 00:13:37,317 --> 00:13:39,945 Gets so lonely all by myself. 123 00:13:43,365 --> 00:13:47,828 The hell with you. I thought you cared. 124 00:13:47,911 --> 00:13:50,831 Sarah, I do care. 125 00:14:01,425 --> 00:14:04,887 That's him. That's him! But he looked different. 126 00:14:04,970 --> 00:14:07,222 He was all painted up white like some kind of dead whore. 127 00:14:07,306 --> 00:14:10,350 I seen him. T-Bird, he sent me in for some road beers, right? 128 00:14:10,434 --> 00:14:12,978 Then he took him away. But I chased him down. 129 00:14:13,061 --> 00:14:15,939 And he flash-fried T-Bird to his fuckin' car! 130 00:14:16,023 --> 00:14:19,484 Oh, T-Bird! Here's to you, buddy. 131 00:14:19,568 --> 00:14:23,530 Maybe we oughta just videotape this, play it back in slow motion. 132 00:14:24,990 --> 00:14:29,912 - Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up! - You see the grave? 133 00:14:29,995 --> 00:14:34,791 - Empty. - Fire it-- Grave? What grave? 134 00:14:34,875 --> 00:14:38,212 - What about my fuckin' grave? - Three out of four. - Oh, man! 135 00:14:38,337 --> 00:14:41,131 He's working his way back to this speed freak right here. 136 00:14:41,215 --> 00:14:43,842 It's not fair. It's Funboy's fault. 137 00:14:43,926 --> 00:14:48,222 That boy was out of control. T-Bird, he came in, he says, ''Waste 'em both.'' 138 00:14:48,305 --> 00:14:51,642 And now this ghost gonna kill my ass next! 139 00:14:54,645 --> 00:14:58,524 This ghost gonna kill my ass next. 140 00:14:58,649 --> 00:15:01,443 - This ghost gonna kill m-- - Hey. 141 00:15:01,527 --> 00:15:03,487 It ain't no ghost. 142 00:15:05,405 --> 00:15:08,992 - They have all arrived. - Watch him. 143 00:15:09,076 --> 00:15:11,870 We might need him. 144 00:15:11,954 --> 00:15:14,373 Ghost gonna kill my ass. 145 00:15:27,344 --> 00:15:31,765 He like his plain or with onions? 146 00:15:31,849 --> 00:15:34,977 Fine. Don't talk to me. 147 00:15:35,060 --> 00:15:39,481 When someone's dead, they can't come back, can they? 148 00:15:39,565 --> 00:15:41,859 That's what I thought. 149 00:15:41,942 --> 00:15:44,319 Are you referring to anyone in particular? 150 00:15:44,444 --> 00:15:46,738 You'll just think I'm nuts. 151 00:15:46,822 --> 00:15:50,659 Yeah, well, then maybe they'll have to lock us both up. 152 00:15:50,742 --> 00:15:53,120 You see him too? 153 00:15:53,203 --> 00:15:56,540 I saw somebody. 154 00:15:56,665 --> 00:16:00,085 Maybe it was your fairy godfather. 155 00:16:00,210 --> 00:16:02,588 Eric didn't come back for me. 156 00:16:02,713 --> 00:16:08,051 He can't be my friend any more because I'm-- I'm alive. 157 00:16:08,135 --> 00:16:11,597 You want a friend to walk you home? 158 00:16:41,043 --> 00:16:44,046 I am the wicked I am the wave of the future 159 00:16:57,476 --> 00:16:59,019 Being crucified 160 00:16:59,102 --> 00:17:03,440 You things, things things of the flesh 161 00:17:03,524 --> 00:17:06,151 Do it slow 162 00:17:06,235 --> 00:17:10,531 Down avenues ''Cut me'' 163 00:17:10,614 --> 00:17:14,284 Lust my eyes 164 00:17:14,368 --> 00:17:21,250 Licking lips encouraging Mr Careworn 165 00:17:21,333 --> 00:17:26,880 To gaze upon the screen Bask on 166 00:17:26,964 --> 00:17:29,007 After the flesh 167 00:17:44,690 --> 00:17:47,901 Boys. 168 00:17:47,985 --> 00:17:51,196 It seems our friend T-Bird won't be joining us this evening... 169 00:17:51,280 --> 00:17:54,074 on account of a slight case of death. 170 00:17:54,199 --> 00:17:56,535 You wanna sit down? 171 00:17:59,454 --> 00:18:03,792 Well, well, well. Devil's Night is upon us again. 172 00:18:03,876 --> 00:18:09,006 I thought we'd throw a little party, start a bunch of fires, make a little profit. 173 00:18:09,131 --> 00:18:11,508 I like the pretty lights. 174 00:18:13,594 --> 00:18:18,348 Problem is, it's all been done before. You see what I'm sayin'? 175 00:18:18,432 --> 00:18:22,394 - That's no reason to quit. - Wrong. 176 00:18:22,477 --> 00:18:27,232 Best reason to quit. Only reason to quit. 177 00:18:27,316 --> 00:18:31,778 A man has an idea. 178 00:18:31,904 --> 00:18:34,281 The idea attracts others... 179 00:18:34,364 --> 00:18:36,617 like-minded. 180 00:18:36,700 --> 00:18:42,122 The idea expands. The idea becomes an institution. 181 00:18:43,457 --> 00:18:46,168 What was the idea? 182 00:18:46,251 --> 00:18:48,712 See, that's what's been bothering me, boys. 183 00:18:48,795 --> 00:18:51,298 And I tell ya, when I used to think about the idea itself... 184 00:18:51,381 --> 00:18:55,511 it'd put a big old smile on my face. 185 00:18:55,594 --> 00:19:02,309 You see, gentlemen, greed is for amateurs. 186 00:19:02,434 --> 00:19:09,024 Disorder, chaos, anarchy-- now, that's fun! 187 00:19:09,149 --> 00:19:12,361 - What about Devil's Night? - What about it? 188 00:19:12,444 --> 00:19:15,739 I started the first fires in this goddam city. 189 00:19:15,822 --> 00:19:19,034 Before I knew it, every charlatan and shitheel was imitating me. 190 00:19:19,117 --> 00:19:22,955 Do you know what they got now? 191 00:19:23,038 --> 00:19:27,084 Devil's Night greeting cards. 192 00:19:27,167 --> 00:19:29,586 Isn't that precious? 193 00:19:29,670 --> 00:19:32,089 Yeah. 194 00:19:32,172 --> 00:19:38,929 The idea has become the institution, boys. Time to move along. 195 00:19:39,012 --> 00:19:41,473 You don't want us to do ''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city? 196 00:19:41,557 --> 00:19:43,934 No. 197 00:19:44,017 --> 00:19:48,272 No, I want you to set a fire so goddam big, the gods'll notice us again. 198 00:19:48,355 --> 00:19:50,148 - That's what I'm sayin'. - Right. 199 00:19:50,274 --> 00:19:54,027 I want all of you boys to be able to look me straight in the eye one more time and say... 200 00:19:54,111 --> 00:19:57,072 ''Are we havin' fun or what?'' 201 00:19:57,155 --> 00:19:59,950 - Hey, you! What's your name? Skank! - Huh? What? 202 00:20:00,033 --> 00:20:03,161 - You don't feel that? - I feel like a little worm on a big fuckin' hook. 203 00:20:04,705 --> 00:20:07,082 ''I feel like a little worm on a big fuckin' hook.'' 204 00:20:07,207 --> 00:20:11,503 Well, boy, your mama must be damn proud of you. 205 00:20:14,423 --> 00:20:16,633 How the hell'd that thing get in here? 206 00:20:18,093 --> 00:20:20,554 Gentlemen. 207 00:20:21,930 --> 00:20:25,309 Let me go! Let me go! I gotta go! 208 00:20:29,855 --> 00:20:36,695 So you're him, huh? The avenger. The killer of killers. 209 00:20:36,778 --> 00:20:41,909 Nice outfit. Not sure about the face though. 210 00:20:41,992 --> 00:20:44,661 I just want him. 211 00:20:44,745 --> 00:20:47,289 Well, you can't have him. 212 00:20:47,372 --> 00:20:49,750 - Well... - Let me go. 213 00:20:52,044 --> 00:20:55,672 I see you have made your decision. 214 00:20:55,756 --> 00:20:59,510 - Now let's see you enforce it. - Aw, this is already boring the shit out of me. 215 00:20:59,593 --> 00:21:02,304 Kill him! 216 00:21:07,309 --> 00:21:10,103 Ooh, that had to hurt. 217 00:21:12,773 --> 00:21:15,025 Well, that's that. 218 00:21:15,108 --> 00:21:17,361 That guy was crazy. 219 00:21:24,034 --> 00:21:26,620 He's gone. 220 00:21:28,956 --> 00:21:31,542 Oh, no! 221 00:21:33,836 --> 00:21:35,587 Get him! 222 00:21:52,688 --> 00:21:55,649 Right here! H-Here, help me! Help me! He's tryin' to kill me! 223 00:22:00,362 --> 00:22:02,114 Jesus Christ! 224 00:22:18,130 --> 00:22:20,382 Hey! 225 00:22:53,081 --> 00:22:55,834 You're all going to die. 226 00:23:09,932 --> 00:23:12,726 Get the fuck outta here! 227 00:23:48,554 --> 00:23:51,431 Guess it's not a good day to be a bad guy, huh, Skank? 228 00:23:51,515 --> 00:23:57,855 I'm not Skank. There's Skank right there. Skank's dead. 229 00:23:57,938 --> 00:24:00,566 That's right. 230 00:24:07,739 --> 00:24:12,828 - What in the crap-- - Don't move! Hold it! 231 00:24:12,911 --> 00:24:16,373 That's all she wrote. Move and we shoot! 232 00:24:24,256 --> 00:24:28,343 You are surrounded by police units. Do not attempt to escape. 233 00:24:31,805 --> 00:24:34,892 - Stop running immediately. - Holy shit! 234 00:24:34,975 --> 00:24:37,644 ...spread your arms and legs-- 235 00:24:43,192 --> 00:24:47,988 Stop immediately. Lie down, spread your arms and legs-- 236 00:25:30,906 --> 00:25:33,200 Come on! Move it! 237 00:25:38,163 --> 00:25:40,791 My advice: next time duck. 238 00:25:42,835 --> 00:25:45,128 So many cops, you'd think they were giving away doughnuts. 239 00:25:48,632 --> 00:25:50,425 Shit! 240 00:25:56,098 --> 00:25:58,642 I knew you were going to do that. 241 00:25:58,725 --> 00:26:03,856 Look at that out there. The whole city oughta be in flames by now. 242 00:26:03,981 --> 00:26:06,358 The sky oughta be red. 243 00:26:06,441 --> 00:26:10,737 So that, I take it, is the late, great Eric Draven. 244 00:26:10,821 --> 00:26:16,535 He has power, but it is power you can take from him. 245 00:26:16,618 --> 00:26:18,412 I like him already. 246 00:26:18,495 --> 00:26:21,623 The crow is his link... 247 00:26:21,707 --> 00:26:26,545 between the land of the living and the realm of the dead. 248 00:26:26,628 --> 00:26:31,133 So kill the crow and destroy the man. 249 00:26:57,117 --> 00:26:59,536 I'm coming home, Shelly. 250 00:27:48,043 --> 00:27:51,964 You're gonna say I shouldn't be in the cemetery in the middle of the night. Right? 251 00:27:52,047 --> 00:27:56,802 - The safest place in the world to be. - That's 'cause everybody's dead. 252 00:27:56,885 --> 00:27:59,930 I knew you'd come here. 253 00:28:00,055 --> 00:28:02,432 It's really late, Sarah. 254 00:28:02,516 --> 00:28:05,686 You didn't say goodbye. 255 00:28:05,769 --> 00:28:09,815 You're just gonna have to forgive me for that. 256 00:28:09,898 --> 00:28:12,317 And you're never coming back. 257 00:28:20,492 --> 00:28:23,704 I gave this to Shelly once. 258 00:28:27,374 --> 00:28:30,335 I think she'd like you to have it. 259 00:28:34,381 --> 00:28:37,259 This way you'll always remember her. 260 00:28:37,384 --> 00:28:40,596 I'll never take it off. 261 00:28:57,863 --> 00:29:01,325 I'd better go sneak back in the house. 262 00:29:08,373 --> 00:29:11,210 Bye. 263 00:29:29,895 --> 00:29:32,189 Shh. Shh. 264 00:29:33,899 --> 00:29:36,485 Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart. 265 00:29:43,492 --> 00:29:45,911 Come on. Come on. 266 00:29:59,883 --> 00:30:03,345 What is that, some sort of souvenir there from your pal? 267 00:30:05,389 --> 00:30:08,016 I'll just keep it for good luck. What do you say? Hmm? 268 00:30:14,398 --> 00:30:17,818 Her eyes are so innocent. 269 00:30:29,413 --> 00:30:32,583 Eric! Eric, help! Eric! 270 00:31:15,501 --> 00:31:17,836 Quick impression for you. 271 00:31:17,920 --> 00:31:21,507 Caw! Caw! Bang! Fuck, I'm dead! 272 00:31:21,590 --> 00:31:24,968 Give me the girl, and I'll let you walk out of here. 273 00:31:27,054 --> 00:31:31,350 Well, well. Why don't you just give me a minute to think about that, huh? 274 00:31:40,817 --> 00:31:42,945 Nah. Fuck it. 275 00:31:51,453 --> 00:31:54,289 Aw, fuck. 276 00:32:00,212 --> 00:32:03,465 Well, well, well, it does seem to me that our little life... 277 00:32:03,549 --> 00:32:06,552 has undergone a rather significant change in the past few minutes. 278 00:32:06,635 --> 00:32:09,763 Now wouldn't you agree? 279 00:32:12,808 --> 00:32:16,228 Well, for a ghost you bleed just fine. 280 00:32:19,773 --> 00:32:22,025 - It's still alive. - Well, then kill it. 281 00:32:24,111 --> 00:32:26,446 Bye-bye, birdie. 282 00:33:10,991 --> 00:33:12,910 Aw, shit. 283 00:33:12,993 --> 00:33:17,289 Well, I just came by to pay my respects, and here you are gettin' all shot up again. 284 00:33:17,414 --> 00:33:20,000 - They've taken Sarah. - How many? 285 00:33:20,083 --> 00:33:22,461 Two more. 286 00:33:22,544 --> 00:33:25,506 - I can handle it. Don't worry. - I'm not worried. 287 00:33:25,547 --> 00:33:29,510 Look, here's the plan. You stay in front, and when they run out of ammo, I'll arrest 'em. 288 00:33:29,593 --> 00:33:33,388 That sounds like a great plan. There's just one problem. 289 00:33:35,724 --> 00:33:38,936 Oh, shit. You're bleedin' all over the place. 290 00:33:39,019 --> 00:33:41,688 I thought, you know, you were invincible. 291 00:33:41,772 --> 00:33:45,192 I was. I'm not any more. 292 00:33:46,485 --> 00:33:50,614 Well, I guess you really will need my help, won't you? Come on. 293 00:33:55,327 --> 00:33:57,204 You take that. 294 00:34:27,317 --> 00:34:30,737 - You were supposed to stay behind me. - I think I messed up. 295 00:34:54,887 --> 00:35:00,893 This is all the power you ever had. Now it is mine. 296 00:35:00,976 --> 00:35:04,855 Pity there is not more time... 297 00:35:04,938 --> 00:35:06,773 for us. 298 00:35:24,833 --> 00:35:27,711 Help me! Eric, I'm scared! 299 00:35:30,464 --> 00:35:32,841 Let me go! 300 00:35:42,017 --> 00:35:45,020 Let her go! 301 00:35:46,480 --> 00:35:49,733 You can have me. I won't fight you. 302 00:35:51,026 --> 00:35:53,195 - All right. - No! 303 00:36:39,825 --> 00:36:41,785 Eric! 304 00:37:00,846 --> 00:37:03,682 - Sarah? - Look out! 305 00:37:09,605 --> 00:37:12,065 Eric! 306 00:37:18,822 --> 00:37:23,410 You know, my daddy used to say, ''Every man's got a devil... 307 00:37:23,493 --> 00:37:25,746 and you can't rest till you find him.'' 308 00:37:25,871 --> 00:37:31,627 Whatever happened back there with you and your girlfriend, I cleared that building. 309 00:37:31,710 --> 00:37:35,088 Hell, nothin' in this town happens without my say-so. 310 00:37:35,172 --> 00:37:38,467 So I'm sorry if I spoiled your wedding plans there, friend. 311 00:37:38,550 --> 00:37:41,553 But if it's any consolation to you... 312 00:37:41,637 --> 00:37:44,848 you have put a smile on my face. 313 00:37:44,932 --> 00:37:50,145 You got a lot of spirit, son. I am gonna miss you. 314 00:37:50,270 --> 00:37:54,733 I have something to give you. I don't want it any more. 315 00:37:59,196 --> 00:38:02,241 Thirty hours of pain. 316 00:38:04,576 --> 00:38:07,246 All at once! 317 00:38:09,164 --> 00:38:11,124 All for you. 318 00:38:35,983 --> 00:38:37,901 Yeah. 319 00:38:45,993 --> 00:38:48,787 Go help him. 320 00:38:52,708 --> 00:38:56,336 Are you alive? 321 00:38:58,297 --> 00:39:00,674 God, I need a cigarette. 322 00:39:06,388 --> 00:39:09,558 - Everybody else dead? - You helped me. 323 00:39:10,851 --> 00:39:13,312 What you kept in here saved me. 324 00:39:13,395 --> 00:39:16,481 - Thanks. - Don't mention it. 325 00:39:16,565 --> 00:39:19,818 I've been meaning to come to church anyway. 326 00:39:24,573 --> 00:39:28,243 Oh, yuck. 327 00:39:28,327 --> 00:39:32,414 I'm quitting as of now, if I live. 328 00:39:41,882 --> 00:39:44,301 Stay with him until help comes. 329 00:39:44,384 --> 00:39:48,472 He'll be okay, right? 330 00:39:48,555 --> 00:39:51,517 Eric? 331 00:39:52,976 --> 00:39:55,354 He does that a lot. 332 00:40:11,411 --> 00:40:13,789 Shelly. 333 00:40:31,932 --> 00:40:34,935 - At least it stopped raining, huh? - It can't rain all the time. 334 00:40:35,018 --> 00:40:39,231 No, I don't believe it. This nightmare your fault, Albrecht? 335 00:40:39,314 --> 00:40:42,317 - Look, you go on home. I'm okay. - Okay. 336 00:40:42,401 --> 00:40:45,988 - You wanna tell me what's going on? - Your vigilante's up on the roof. 337 00:40:47,990 --> 00:40:52,202 - You missed it. - Get him out of here. 338 00:41:56,517 --> 00:41:58,894 Thanks. 339 00:42:03,774 --> 00:42:07,027 If the people we love are stolen from us... 340 00:42:07,110 --> 00:42:11,740 the way to have them live on is to never stop loving them. 341 00:42:11,823 --> 00:42:14,868 Buildings burn, people die... 342 00:42:14,952 --> 00:42:17,329 but real love is forever. 343 00:42:35,848 --> 00:42:39,017 We walk the narrow path 344 00:42:41,520 --> 00:42:44,398 Beneath the smoking skies 345 00:42:46,567 --> 00:42:50,362 Sometimes barely tell the difference 346 00:42:52,698 --> 00:42:56,618 Between darkness and light 347 00:42:59,997 --> 00:43:02,165 Do we have faith 348 00:43:06,128 --> 00:43:08,297 In what we believe 349 00:43:12,217 --> 00:43:14,928 The truest test 350 00:43:15,012 --> 00:43:17,764 Is when we cannot 351 00:43:17,848 --> 00:43:20,934 When we cannot see 352 00:43:22,853 --> 00:43:26,106 I hear pounding feet in the 353 00:43:26,190 --> 00:43:29,109 In the streets below and the 354 00:43:37,826 --> 00:43:41,455 It's hard to believe that love 358 00:43:41,538 --> 00:43:45,125 Will prevail 359 00:43:45,209 --> 00:43:50,631 Oh, it won't rain all the time 360 00:43:52,007 --> 00:46:09,645 --> 00:46:15,234 You took me into your arms 389 00:46:15,317 --> 00:46:18,403 Whispering and kissing me 390 00:46:18,445 --> 00:46:23,367 And telling me to still believe 391 00:46:24,910 --> 00:46:27,663 Within the emptiness of the burning cities 392 00:46:27,746 --> 00:46:30,707 Against which we save our darkest selves 393 00:46:30,791 --> 00:46:33,418 Until I felt safe 394 00:46:33,502 --> 00:46:35,546 And warm 395 00:46:35,671 --> 00:46:38,423 I fell asleep in your arms 396 00:46:38,507 --> 00:46:40,759 And when I awoke 397 00:46:40,843 --> 00:46:43,053 I cried again 398 00:46:43,136 --> 00:46:45,013 For you were gone 399 00:46:45,097 --> 00:46:48,433 Oh, can you hear me 400 00:46:48,517 --> 00:46:53,063 It won't rain all the time 401 00:46:54,523 --> 00:47:00,779
